participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and nurturing, she loves to engage with children and finds joy in teaching.
participant_1.background: i'm getting married in the spring. i love eating out with friends. my favorite singer is taylor swift. i'm 24 years old. i work at a school as a kindergarten teacher.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, he enjoys exploring new cultures and trying out different cuisines.
participant_2.background: i visit europe twice a year. i'm an art major in college. i love to cook paella. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i'm a descendant of christopher columbus.

content.text: Dude, I don't understand you. Please, use English. (¬‿¬)
